name: Mederva Health
headline: Medical expertise for everyone.
description: Mederva Health extends the doctor's clinic by providing medically-prescribed lifestyle interventions between visits. Our mobile app and care team help reduce risk factors for diseases like diabetes, heart disease, and strokes. We enhance patient outcomes, save time, and boost revenue at no added cost so doctors can provide better care for their patients.

founders.name: Sabih Mir, Founder
founders.description:
I studied cognitive psych and mechanical engineering (Human Factors) at Tufts (as well as English, Philosophy) and have been in Product and UX Design for 20+ years. I was the first designer at Ginger (now Headspace Health). Born and raised just north of NYC to Kashmiri and Pakistani immigrants, I spent ~15 years in Boston and now live in Oakland, CA.

My goal is to collaborate with folks that care about people and want to shape the impact technology has on humanity for the greater good.

founders.name: Mohammed Kaleel, Founder
founders.description:
Hacker turned Physician turned Founder.

I grew up in the US Virgin Islands. Family is from Palestine. 

I studied Comp Sci & Math in undergrad, was an early engineer at two failed startups in mid 2000s. I went to medical school. Created a viral iOs app that was #1 in the Health category with 5M+ users. Finished training and joined as Faculty at Stanford in Musculoskeletal Radiology. Met my cofounders playing basketball in the Mission in SF. We started Mederva Health to help people at scale.

# **Better Health Starts Here**
Transform your health through personalized plans and expert support.
[Learn More](https://medervahealth.com/<#learn-more>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/629eaaf8243e46ce6f876dbf/66bbb4c88da14eb5f9d5baef_conditions.png)
care beyond the office
### Your health concierge
Mederva Health empowers you by providing personalized, expert care. We bring together world-class medical expertise and customized care to fit seamlessly into your busy life.
Our primary focus is to address your unique health needs with personalized care plans—helping you manage chronic conditions, improve your overall well-being, and achieve lasting health transformations. By starting with small, manageable steps, we guide you toward a healthier future.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/629eaaf8243e46ce6f876dbf/62c4a981d0e38bddd9a52b9a_icon-support.png)
#### Guided Support
We use the latest behavioral therapy techniques to help patients succeed, taking the time to understand their unique challenges, answer their questions, and hold them accountable to the changes they need to get healthy.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/629eaaf8243e46ce6f876dbf/62c4a9b7f9fbe83c3e7b3c22_icon-tools.png)
#### Modern Tools
Our intuitive mobile app is simple to use, provides clear guidance, and is powered by AI that supplements the support we provide. Patients get direct access to their personalized health program and care team with easy-to-follow instructions.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/629eaaf8243e46ce6f876dbf/66bd7788c450ba47dafb3d77_icon-expert.png)
#### Expert Advice
Patients are guided by our team of care experts, including doctors, nutritionists, health coaches, and behavioral therapists. They get 24/7 accessible guidance and continuous support on their journey towards better health.
reducing risk factors for disease
### Conditions We Support
#### **Diabetes**
#### **Kidney Diseases**
#### **Stress**
#### **Hypertension**
#### **Strokes**
#### **Addiction/Smoking**
#### **High Cholesterol**
#### **Low Testosterone**
#### **Sleep Disorders**
#### **Heart Disease**
#### **Cancer**
#### **Med Adherence**
Handpicked specialists
### We've carefully selected our medical experts.
Our specialists have been hand chosen and are all experienced, US board-certified physicians in their area of medical expertise. They come from a variety of top medical institutions, including Stanford, Johns Hopkins, Yale, and Harvard Medical.
## Dive deeper
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/629eaaf8243e46ce6f876dbf/62c49b5e9efc0f1f728c7547_icon-hospital.png)
#### For Hospitals
Learn more about how we work with hospitals to augment the institutional capability and healthcare of their organizations.
[LEARN MORE](https://medervahealth.com/</before/for-hospitals>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/629eaaf8243e46ce6f876dbf/6733fb56cbac34651d4ea961_ForDoctors.png)
#### For Doctors
Learn how Mederva covers the extra work for you by giving your patients personalized guidance and support so you have more time for your practice.
[LEARN MORE](https://medervahealth.com/</for-doctors>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/629eaaf8243e46ce6f876dbf/6733fb674c2f88b391225110_ForPatients.png)
#### For Patients
Learn how our personalized approach to behavior change can help you reduce risk factors for diseases like heart disease, stroke, and diabetes.
[LEARN MORE](https://medervahealth.com/</for-patients>)
Get In Touch
# Supercharge your medical care, today.
[Contact Us](https://medervahealth.com/</contact-us>)
[![logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/629eaaf8243e46ce6f876dbf/62ba2a51ca10f824752c72bc_logo-white-Mederva%20Health.png)](https://medervahealth.com/<#>)

generated_description:
**Mederva Health: Bridging the Gap in Healthcare**

Founded in 2021 and part of Y Combinator's Winter 2022 batch, Mederva Health is a San Francisco-based startup with a mission: "Medical expertise for everyone." With a compact team of just two employees, Mederva has ambitious goals to empower patients by extending the care provided in doctors' offices through innovative lifestyle interventions.

**What They Do**

Mederva Health facilitates medically-prescribed lifestyle changes that occur between patient visits. Their intuitive mobile app, combined with a dedicated care team, plays a central role in helping patients manage their health risks related to conditions like diabetes, heart disease, and strokes—ultimately enhancing patient outcomes and reducing the time burden on doctors. This mix of personalized care and technology aims to support chronic conditions while allowing physicians to focus on providing top-quality care without extra costs.

**The Approach**

Their model emphasizes personalized health plans tailored to individual patient needs. Mederva pairs patients with a mix of healthcare professionals, including doctors, nutritionists, health coaches, and behavioral therapists, ensuring 24/7 support. By utilizing the latest behavioral therapy techniques and AI-powered tools, Mederva makes health management accessible and effective.

**Conditions Addressed**

Mederva Health targets a wide range of health conditions, including:
- Diabetes
- Heart Disease
- Hypertension
- Stress
- Sleep Disorders
- And many more...

By carefully selecting US board-certified specialists from prestigious institutions like Stanford, Johns Hopkins, and Yale, they ensure that expert care is always within reach.

**Why Choose Mederva Health?**

The company's model not only enriches patient care but also supports doctors by providing additional resources. This creates a win-win situation where patients have better chances of health transformation, and doctors gain back precious time to focus on their practice.

With Mederva Health, better health truly starts here. If you're looking to supercharge your healthcare experience, check them out at [MedervaHealth.com](https://medervahealth.com/).
